txt.en:
I wish to see you both before I pass away, but I fear it is not to be so. I only hope to mend the hatred by leading you along in such a way.

I have left a false deed with the notary, and the true deed is locked away. The true deed will say who inherits the house -- Sigun or Sigmar.

I grow tired now, my sons. Dreadfully tired. I will try to keep writing. The third colour is purple.
